articles.author: AFP
articles.title: China's Su blasts into Olympic 100m final, Bromell out - New Straits Times
articles.description: TOKYO: China’s Su Bingtian ran an Asian record of 9.83 seconds to qualify for the men’s Olympic 100m final on Sunday, while US medal hope Trayvon Bromell missed the cut.
